TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeflateStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 提供方法和屬性，以透過 Deflate 演算法來壓縮和解壓縮資料流。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for compressing and decompressing streams by using the Deflate algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表 Deflate 演算法，也就是不失真的檔案壓縮和解壓縮的業界標準演算法。This class represents the Deflate algorithm, which is an industry-standard algorithm for lossless file compression and decompression. 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別會使用 zlib 程式庫。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class uses the zlib library. 如此一來，它提供更好的壓縮演算法，而且在大部分情況下，比起較小的壓縮的檔提供在舊版的.NET Framework。As a result, it provides a better compression algorithm and, in most cases, a smaller compressed file than it provides in earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 這個類別原本就提供將檔案加入至或從 zip 封存解壓縮檔案的功能。This class does not inherently provide functionality for adding files to or extracting files from zip archives. 若要使用的 zip 封存，請使用而類別。To work with zip archives, use the and the classes. 類別會使用相同的壓縮演算法所使用的 gzip 資料格式為類別。The class uses the same compression algorithm as the gzip data format used by the class. 中的壓縮功能和公開為資料流。The compression functionality in and is exposed as a stream. 資料是讀取位元組的基礎，因此無法執行多次傳遞才能判斷壓縮整個檔案或大型資料區塊的最佳方法。Data is read on a byte-by-byte basis, so it is not possible to perform multiple passes to determine the best method for compressing entire files or large blocks of data. 和類別最適合使用未壓縮的資料來源上。The and classes are best used on uncompressed sources of data. 如果已經壓縮的來源資料，使用這些類別可能會增加資料流的大小。If the source data is already compressed, using these classes may actually increase the size of the stream. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別壓縮和解壓縮檔案的目錄。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a directory of files. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以壓縮的檔案大於 4 GB 會導致例外狀況。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB will cause an exception.

param.name: stream
param.span: 要壓縮的資料流。

span.span: The stream to compress.

param.name: compressionLevel
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出當壓縮資料流時是否要強調速度或壓縮的效益。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression efficiency when compressing the stream.

summary.span: 使用指定的資料流和壓縮層級，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要指定是否壓縮效率和速度會更重要的執行個體時，會使用這個建構函式類別。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class. 這個建構函式多載會使用壓縮模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要將壓縮模式設定為另一個值，使用或多載。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立時設定壓縮層級物件。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 資料流不支援寫入作業，例如壓縮。

span.span: The stream does not support write operations such as compression.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: stream
param.span: 要壓縮或解壓縮的資料流。

span.span: The stream to compress or decompress.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，表示要壓縮還是解壓縮資料流。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to compress or decompress the stream.

summary.span: 使用指定的資料流和壓縮模式，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified stream and compression mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，擁有基礎資料流，因此關閉資料流也會關閉基礎資料流。By default, owns the underlying stream, so closing the stream also closes the underlying stream. 請注意，基礎資料流的狀態可能會影響資料流的可用性。Note that the state of the underlying stream can affect the usability of the stream. 此外，任何明確的檢查會不執行，所以會建立新的執行個體時，會擲不回任何其他的例外狀況。Also, no explicit checks are performed, so no additional exceptions are thrown when the new instance is created. 如果執行個體類別會透過`mode`參數等於`Compress`，立即插入標頭資訊。If an instance of the class is created with the `mode` parameter equal to `Compress`, header information is inserted immediately. 如果不發生任何進一步的動作，資料流就會顯示為有效、 空白以及壓縮檔案。If no further action occurs, the stream appears as a valid, empty, compressed file. 使用類別，以壓縮的檔案大於 4 GB 引發例外狀況。Using the class to compress a file larger than 4 GB raises an exception. 根據預設，壓縮層級設定為壓縮模式時。By default, the compression level is set to when the compression mode is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別壓縮和解壓縮檔案。The following example shows how to use the class to compress and decompress a file. [!code-csharp[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/CS/deflatetest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.Deflate1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.Compression.Deflate1/VB/deflatetest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要指定是否壓縮效率和速度會更重要的執行個體時，會使用這個建構函式類別，以及是否要在處置之後，將資料流物件保持開啟物件。You use this constructor when you want to specify whether compression efficiency or speed is more important for an instance of the class, and whether to leave the stream object open after disposing the object. 這個建構函式多載會使用壓縮模式。This constructor overload uses the compression mode . 若要將壓縮模式設定為另一個值，使用或多載。To set the compression mode to another value, use the or overload. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立時設定壓縮層級物件，以及如何將資料流保持開啟。The following example shows how to set the compression level when creating a object and how to leave the stream open. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.deflatestream/vb/program2.vb#2)]

span.span: The byte offset in at which to begin reading data from the stream.

span.span: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the read operation is complete.

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.

param.name: asyncState

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation.

summary.span: (請考慮使用 方法替代。)

span.span: (Consider using the method instead.)

returns.span: 物件，表示可能還在暫止中的非同步讀取作業。

span.span: An object that represents the asynchronous read operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步讀取的作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步檔案 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 傳遞傳回值以方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源的資料流。Pass the return value to the method of the stream to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 您可以藉由使用相同的程式碼呼叫或在傳遞至回呼。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 非同步讀取或寫入作業時，會發出，不在 I/O 作業完成時，會更新資料流中目前的位置。The current position in the stream is updated when the asynchronous read or write operation is issued, not when the I/O operation completes. 多個同時的非同步要求轉譯要求完成順序不確定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援讀取。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports reading. 如果資料流已關閉，或您傳遞無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即從。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 非同步的讀取要求時，例如磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會發生在執行緒集區執行緒和呼叫時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

exception.span: 嘗試非同步讀取的方法超越資料流結尾，或發生了磁碟錯誤。

span.span: The method tried to read asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.

exception.span: 關閉資料流後呼叫了方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: 目前的 實作不支援讀取作業。

span.span: The current implementation does not support the read operation.
This call cannot be completed.

span.span: An object that represents the asynchronous write operation, which could still be pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步寫入作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous write operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步檔案 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 傳遞到目前的方法所傳回的物件以確保寫入完成，並適當地釋放資源。Pass the object returned by the current method to to ensure that the write completes and frees resources appropriately. 您可以藉由使用相同的程式碼呼叫或在傳遞至回呼。You can do this either by using the same code that called or in a callback passed to . 如果非同步寫入作業期間發生錯誤，將不會擲回例外狀況之前呼叫這個方法所傳回。If an error occurs during an asynchronous write operation, an exception will not be thrown until is called with the returned by this method. 如果可寫入資料流，寫入資料流的結尾會展開資料流。If a stream is writable, writing at the end of the stream expands the stream. 當您發出非同步的讀取或寫入作業，不在 I/O 作業完成時，會更新資料流中目前的位置。The current position in the stream is updated when you issue the asynchronous read or write operation, not when the I/O operation completes. 多個同時的非同步要求轉譯要求完成順序不確定。Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain. 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援寫入。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports writing. 如果資料流已關閉，或您傳遞無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即從。If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from . 非同步寫入要求，例如磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會發生在執行緒集區執行緒和呼叫時擲回例外狀況。Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and throw exceptions when calling .

exception.span: 嘗試非同步寫入的方法超越資料流結尾，或發生了磁碟錯誤。

span.span: The method tried to write asynchronously past the end of the stream, or a disk error occurred.
One or more of the arguments is invalid.

exception.span: 關閉資料流後呼叫了方法。

span.span: Methods were called after the stream was closed.

exception.span: 目前的 實作不支援寫入作業。

span.span: The current implementation does not support the write operation.

exception.span: 無法執行寫入作業，因為資料流已關閉。

span.span: The write operation cannot be performed because the stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以使用來執行非同步讀取的作業方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can perform asynchronous read operations by using the method. 方法是中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，您可以實作非同步 I/O 作業更輕鬆地使用新的非同步方法。The method is still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, you can implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily by using the new async methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步檔案 I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous File I/O](~/docs/standard/io/asynchronous-file-i-o.md). 呼叫這個方法來判斷資料流中讀取多少個位元組。Call this method to determine how many bytes were read from the stream. 可以一次呼叫這個方法，來傳回呼叫之間所讀取的位元組數量和。This method can be called once to return the amount of bytes read between calls to and . 這個方法會封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成為止。This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.
